title: Wales captain Alun Wyn Jones looks like a man destined to lift World Cup, says former South Africa coach Jake White
text:
Jake White believes Alun Wyn Jones has the look of a man “destined” to lead his country to Rugby World Cup glory, comparing him with other greats of the game such as John Eales, Francois Pienaar and Richie McCaw.

White, who led the Boks to World Cup glory in 2007, added that Wales’s euphoric reaction after they scraped home against France in last Sunday’s quarter-final, not to mention the fact they have won their last four games against South Africa, suggested to him that that they might win Sunday’s semi-final.

“The fact they were so pushed to beat France, they will get a massive amount of confidence from that,” said White, who was speaking in Tokyo ahead of the game. “Looking at Dan Biggar’s...
description: Jake White believes Alun Wyn Jones has the look of a man “destined” to lead his country to Rugby World Cup glory, comparing him with other greats of the game such as John Eales, Francois Pienaar and Richie McCaw.
